puzzle.title: Webcomics
puzzle.hint:
List of Characters
- Aubrey from Something Positive - Detestai from RPG World - Brent from PVP - Annabelle from Inherit the Earth - Hazel from Girls with Slingshots - Ray Smuckles from Achewood - Zeetha from Girl Genius - Atlas from Lackadaisy - Snooch from Two Lumps - Freyja from Diesel Sweeties - Nick Wellington from General Protection Fault - Ozy from Ozy and Millie - Marten Reed from Questionable Content - Tip Wilkin from Skin Horse - Catsby from Penny Arcade - Sheldon from Sheldon - Millie from Ozy and Millie - Gabe from Penny Arcade - Tagon from Schlock Mercenary - Torg from Sluggy Freelance - Avery from Ozy and Millie - Mitzi May from Lackadaisy - John Egbert from Homestuck - Gilgamesh from Girl Genius - Dragobo from RPG World - Kestrel from Queen of Wands - Machine Elf from Overcompensating - Hero from RPG World - Buck Godot from Buck Godot - Maura from Diesel Sweeties - Joanna from Overcompensating - Gwynn from Sluggy Freelance - Modest Medusa from Modest Medusa
The text below each portrait is a cryptogram for the character's name.
Read the boxed letter in each character's name in order, left to right and top to bottom.
Once you have the webcomics with non-human characters, look at their first letters in order to find out where to go.
